Generation IX.Scarlet: It resembles a mysterious object introduced in a paranormal magazine as a cutting-edge weapon shaped like a Cobalion .
Generation IX.Violet: There was supposedly an incident in which it launched shining blades to cut everything around it to pieces. Little else is known about it.
